column2: Allow pops/factories to buy from the country's stockpile.\n\n§YNOTE: §RNEVER§W use this button while you are still buying or selling manually. §RONLY§W use it with automatic trade §GON§W for §RALL§W goods.§W §RFailing to do so will cause economy crashes both locally and globally. Use it at your own risk.§W

Synthetic rubber, like other polymers, is made from various petroleum-based monomers. The most prevalent synthetic rubber is styrene-butadiene rubbers (SBR) derived from the copolymerisation of styrene and 1,3-butadiene.
dissolve all alliances and release all puppets
